reviews.title: Nice but somewhat dated
reviews.text: We stayed at the Radisson on Monday, February 20th. I booked the room through Hotwire for a price of $95.00/night for three people. We were in Room 206.

The service at the hotel is outstanding. The employees are very nice and very helpful. When we went to the pool there were no towels. One call to the desk and less than 5 minutes later there were towels.
reviews.title: Would never stay at this hotel again
